name: Mechoid Deflectoid
description:
Battle a robot in a game of missile tennis, but defend your health and energy with quick blocks.

Note: this game was designed for desktop, so the web version available on this page is not perfect. If you want to get a better experience, you should consider downloading it for free below!

Controls:

Space: block
Arrow keys or WASD: move
1-9 (top row): Fire missiles

Partial controller support.

Mechoid Deflectoid was made in 6 days for the Weekly Game Jam #174. We used this game to practice and experiment with Godot. It was a ton of fun working on it!

Contributors:
  • Ayman Lezhar : programming, game design, vector art
  • Luke I. Wilson : lead programming, game design
  • DimX : sounds, music, background
Specifications: Languages
  • GDScript
  • GLSL
Tools
  • Godot Engine v3.2.3
  • InkScape
  • Gimp
  • LMMS
  • Git
  • Linux <3

Source code: https://github.com/codemessiah/space-tennis-game

(Some non-native English speakers, so the layout can be messy and some mistyped words. Excuse it!)
